member.name: F:Orbital.Numerics.MathTools.pi
member.summary: Represents the ratio of the circumference of a circle to its diameter, specified by the constant, π.

member.name: F:Orbital.Numerics.MathTools.pi2
member.summary: Represents the ratio of the circumference of a circle to its diameter, specified by the constant, π, multiplied by 2.

member.name: F:Orbital.Numerics.MathTools.pi4
member.summary: Represents the ratio of the circumference of a circle to its diameter, specified by the constant, π, multiplied by 4.

member.name: F:Orbital.Numerics.MathTools.piHalf
member.summary: Represents the ratio of the circumference of a circle to its diameter, specified by the constant, π, divided by 2.

member.name: F:Orbital.Numerics.MathTools.piQuarter
member.summary: Represents the ratio of the circumference of a circle to its diameter, specified by the constant, π, divided by 4.

member.name: F:Orbital.Numerics.MathTools.piDelta
member.summary: Represents 1 divided by the ratio of the circumference of a circle to its diameter, specified by the constant, π.

member.name: F:Orbital.Numerics.MathTools.piHalfDelta
member.summary: Represents 1 divided by the ratio of the circumference of a circle to its diameter, specified by the constant, π, divided by 2.

member.name: F:Orbital.Numerics.MathTools.piQuarterDelta
member.summary: Represents 1 divided by the ratio of the circumference of a circle to its diameter, specified by the constant, π, divided by 4.
